mapper.select:
SELECT lwh.work_order_id, lwd.pottery_altar_apply_weight as ApplyWeight, lwh.liquor_name, lwh.liquor_batch_id, lwh.liquor_level, lwh.liquor_source, lwh.liquor_round, lwh.liquor_brewing_time, lwh.liquor_flavor_name, lwh.liquor_year, lwh.liquor_content, lwh.pottery_altar_apply_weight, lwt.weighing_tank_number, lwh.remaining_weight, lpam.pottery_altar_number, sdd.dict_label as potteryAltarState, lwh.area_name, lwh.fire_zone_name, lpam.pottery_altar_full_altar_weight FROM laocz_wine_history lwh LEFT JOIN laocz_wine_details lwd ON lwd.liquor_batch_id = lwh.liquor_batch_id LEFT JOIN laocz_weighing_tank lwt ON lwh.weighing_tank = lwt.weighing_tank_id LEFT JOIN laocz_pottery_altar_management lpam ON lpam.pottery_altar_id = lwh.pottery_altar_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data sdd ON lpam.pottery_altar_state = sdd.dict_value AND sdd.dict_type = 'Ceramide_condition'
and lwh.win_his_id = #{winHisId}

lwd.pottery_altar_apply_weight, NULL as `remaining_weight`, -- 剩余重量，需要根据实际情况提供 NULL as `loss_weight`, -- 损失重量，需要根据实际情况提供 lwd.weighing_tank, lwd.pump_id, lwd.weighing_tank_weight, lwd.operation_time, NULL as `sampling_purpose`, -- 取样目的，需要根据实际情况提供 NULL as `sampling_weight`, -- 取样重量，需要根据实际情况提供 lai.area_name, lfzi.fire_zone_name, lpam.pottery_altar_number, lpam.pottery_altar_qr_code_address, lpam.pottery_altar_full_altar_weight, llm.liquor_name, llm.liquor_level, NULL as `liquor_round`, -- 酒的轮次，需要根据实际情况提供 llm.liquor_flavor_name, llm.liquor_source, llm.liquor_year, llm.liquor_brewing_time, 备注，需要根据实际情况提供 FROM laocz_wine_details lwd INNER JOIN laocz_wine_operations lwo ON lwd.busy_id=lwo.busy_id LEFT JOIN laocz_pottery_altar_management lpam ON lwd.pottery_altar_id=lpam.pottery_altar_id LEFT JOIN laocz_fire_zone_info lfzi ON lfzi.fire_zone_id=lpam.fire_zone_id LEFT JOIN laocz_area_info lai ON lai.area_id=lfzi.area_id LEFT JOIN laocz_liquor_batch llb ON llb.liquor_batch_id=lwd.liquor_batch_id LEFT JOIN laocz_liquor_management llm ON llm.liquor_management_id=llb.liquor_management_id
